an10.34:1.1: “Katihi nu kho, bhante, dhammehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā upasampādetabban”ti?
an10.34:1.2: “Dasahi kho, upāli, dhammehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā upasampādetabbaṃ.
an10.34:1.4: Idhupāli, bhikkhu sīlavā hoti, pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto viharati ācāragocarasampanno aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī, samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu;
an10.34:1.5: bahussuto hoti sutadharo sutasannicayo, ye te dhammā ādikalyāṇā majjhekalyāṇā pariyosānakalyāṇā sātthaṃ sabyañjanaṃ kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ parisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ abhivadanti, tathārūpāssa dhammā bahussutā honti dhātā vacasā paricitā manasānupekkhitā diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā;
an10.34:1.6: pātimokkhaṃ kho panassa vitthārena svāgataṃ hoti suvibhattaṃ suppavattaṃ suvinicchitaṃ suttaso anubyañjanaso;
an10.34:1.7: paṭibalo hoti gilānaṃ upaṭṭhātuṃ vā upaṭṭhāpetuṃ vā;
an10.34:1.8: paṭibalo hoti anabhiratiṃ vūpakāsetuṃ vā vūpakāsāpetuṃ vā;
an10.34:1.9: paṭibalo hoti uppannaṃ kukkuccaṃ dhammato vinodetuṃ;
an10.34:1.10: paṭibalo hoti uppannaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ dhammato vivecetuṃ;
an10.34:1.14: Imehi kho, upāli, dasahi dhammehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā upasampādetabban”ti.
